long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically summarize any YouTube video with our AI-powered video summarization tool! 
Our extension analyzes the video's audio and generates a summary, allowing you to quickly get the key takeaways without having to watch the entire video.
Perfect for busy learners, researchers, and professionals. 
Try our ChatGPT Video Summarizer for YouTube today!
